    Class DatabaseRetryDecorator<TCommand>

    Decorates a command handler to include retry logic in case of failures.

    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    ICommandHandler<TCommand> commandHandler

    The command handler to be decorated.
    ILogger logger

    int retryCount

    The number of retry attempts (default is 3).
